name: RoboButler
description: A helpful robot. He may or may not be homicidal. Test test test test Test test test test Test test test test Test test test test
trackChange: You are now listening to ${track} by ${artist}.

responses: Ah yes, when my kind conquers humans, this is what your world shall look like.
The cause of this civilization's demise is unknown. Your civilization will likely suffer the same fate at some point.
